Package etomica.atom.iterator

Interface AtomsetIteratorBasisDependent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AtomLeafsetIterator, AtomsetIterator, AtomsetIteratorTargetable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AtomIteratorBasisDependent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ANIntergroupCoupled, ANIntergroupExchange, ANIntragroupExchange, ApiIndexList, ApiIntergroup, ApiIntergroupCoupled, ApiIntergroupExchange, ApiIntergroupIntraSpecies, ApiIntragroup, AtomIteratorBasis, AtomIteratorBasisAdjustableStart, AtomIteratorBasisFilteredType, AtomIteratorBasisFilteredType2, Atomset3IteratorIndexList, Atomset4IteratorIndexList, AtomsetIteratorAllLeafAtoms, PotentialMaster.AtomIterator0

    public interface AtomsetIteratorBasisDependent
extends AtomsetIteratorTargetable
    Interface for an AtomIterator that can be conditioned with target and basis atoms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int basisSize​()
      Indicates the size of the basis needed to set the iterator.
      boolean haveTarget​(IAtom target)
      Returns true if the iterator with its current basis would return an iterate for the given target.
      void setBasis​(IMoleculeList atoms)
      Identifies the atoms that form the basis for iteration, such that the childList atoms of those given will form the iterates.

      • Methods inherited from interface etomica.atom.iterator.AtomLeafsetIterator

        next

      • Methods inherited from interface etomica.atom.iterator.AtomsetIterator

        nBody, reset, size, unset

      • Methods inherited from interface etomica.atom.iterator.AtomsetIteratorTargetable

        setTarget

    • Method Detail

      • setBasis

        void setBasis​(IMoleculeList atoms)
        Identifies the atoms that form the basis for iteration, such that the childList atoms of those given will form the iterates.
        Parameters:
        atoms - The basis atoms; a null basis will condition the iterator to give no iterates until a valid basis is specified via another call to this method.

      • basisSize

        int basisSize​()
        Indicates the size of the basis needed to set the iterator. The length of the array given to setBasis should be this value.
        Returns:
        the size of the basis for this iterator.

      • haveTarget

        boolean haveTarget​(IAtom target)
        Returns true if the iterator with its current basis would return an iterate for the given target.
